```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, 
                      warning = FALSE)
options(xtable.comment = FALSE, 
        xtable.caption.placement = 'bottom',
        xtable.size = 'small',
        booktabs = TRUE)
library(drake)
library(ggplot2)
library(xtable)
library(tidyr)
library(stringr)
```

```{r table species gain global, results = 'asis'}
loadd(significant_gain_global, significant_gain_site, sites)
glance_table(significant_gain_global) %>%
  select(recipient, estimate, statistic, p.value) %>%
  mutate(recipient = paste0('{\\emph{ ', recipient, '}}')) %>%
  rename(`p value` = p.value,
         `difference` = estimate,
         `plant species` = recipient) %>%
  xtable(caption = "Results of testing the alternative hypothesis that the conspecific pollen density in open flowers is greater than the density in bagged flowers. Tests were performed at the species level (across communities).") %>%
  print.xtable(sanitize.text.function = function(x) x)
```

```{r table species gain site, results = 'asis'}
loadd(significant_gain_global, significant_gain_site, sites)
glance_table(significant_gain_site) %>%
  inner_join(sites, by = "site_name") %>%
  group_by(recipient) %>%
  mutate(n_sites = n_distinct(site_name)) %>%
  filter(n_sites > 1) %>%
  group_by() %>%
  mutate(site_name = paste(locality_name, land_use, fragment, sep = ' - '),
         recipient = paste0('{\\emph{ ', recipient, '}}')) %>%
  select(recipient, site_name, estimate, statistic, p.value) %>%
  rename(`p value` = p.value,
         `difference` = estimate,
         `plant species` = recipient, 
         `community` = site_name) %>%
  xtable(caption = "Results of testing the alternative hypothesis that the conspecific pollen density in open flowers is greater than the density in bagged flowers. Tests were performed at the community level. Only species present in more than one community are shown.") %>%
  print(sanitize.text.function = function(x) x)
```

```{r variation across sites, results='asis'}
loadd(consp_self)
consp_self %>%
  anova(test = "Chisq")  %>%
  xtable(caption = 'Analysis of variance of conspecific pollen density in bagged flowers (self pollination rate).  Density were modelled using a quasipoisson distribution. The model suggests that self-pollination rates are species dependent but not across.')
```

```{r plot conspecific per site, fig.height = 7, fig.cap="Conspecific pollen density across plant species for different communities. Community names are abbreviated: AN stands for Anquilóo, LC for Las Chiclas, and SC for San Claudio."}
loadd(dep_frame, sites)
site_plots_conspecific <- dep_frame %>%
  filter(pollen_category == 'conspecific') %>%
  inner_join(sites, by = 'site_name') %>%
  mutate(recipient_short = shorten_sp_name(recipient)) %>% 
  plyr::dlply('site_name', function(x){
    x %>%
      ggplot(aes(y = pollen_density + 1, x = recipient_short,
                 fill = treatment)) +
      geom_boxplot(size = 0.25, outlier.size = 0.5, outlier.stroke = 0.5) +
      scale_y_log10(breaks = c(10,100,1000)) +
      coord_flip() + 
      ggtitle(paste(x$locality[1], '-', x$land_use, x$fragment)) +
      pub_theme() +
      xlab(NULL) +
      ylab('pollen density') +
      scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Greys")
  })

legend <- cowplot::get_legend(site_plots_conspecific[[1]])
 
site_plots_conspecific <- site_plots_conspecific %>%
  plyr::llply(function(x) {
    x + theme(legend.position = 'none', 
              title = element_text(size = 6))
  })

site_plots_conspecific <- rlist::list.append(site_plots_conspecific, legend)

cowplot::plot_grid(plotlist = site_plots_conspecific, ncol = 3)

```


```{r plot conspecific per plant, fig.height = 7, fig.cap="Conspecific pollen density across communities for different study species. Only species present in more than onse site are shown. Community names are abbreviated: AN stands for Anquilóo, LC for Las Chiclas, and SC for San Claudio; A, and R indicate that the community corresponded to an agricultural or reserve site respectively."}
loadd(dep_frame, sites)
plant_plots_conspecific <- dep_frame %>%
  filter(pollen_category == 'conspecific') %>%
  inner_join(sites, by = 'site_name') %>%
  mutate(recipient_short = shorten_sp_name(recipient)) %>%
  group_by(recipient) %>%
  mutate(n_sites = n_distinct(site_name), 
         site_name = `str_sub<-`(site_name, 1, 3, ''), 
         site_name = str_replace_all(site_name, '_', ' - ')) %>%
  group_by() %>%
  filter(n_sites >= 2) %>%
  plyr::dlply('recipient', function(x){
    x %>%
      ggplot(aes(y = pollen_density + 1, x = site_name,
                 fill = treatment)) +
      geom_boxplot(size = 0.25, outlier.size = 0.5, outlier.stroke = 0.5) +
      scale_y_log10(breaks = c(10,100,1000)) +
      coord_flip() +
      ggtitle(paste(x$recipient[1])) +
      pub_theme() +
      xlab(NULL) +
      ylab('pollen density') +
      scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Greys")
  })

legend <- cowplot::get_legend(plant_plots_conspecific[[1]])

plant_plots_conspecific <- plant_plots_conspecific %>%
  plyr::llply(function(x) {
    x + theme(legend.position = 'none',
              title = element_text(size = 6))
  })

plant_plots_conspecific <- rlist::list.append(plant_plots_conspecific, legend)

cowplot::plot_grid(plotlist = plant_plots_conspecific, ncol = 3)
```
